body: If you check out the [Contribution Guide](http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contribution_guide.html#unit-tests), you'll notice that more than a third of the guide is the output of a single command, `spack test --collect-only`. This PR switches to `spack test --list`, which only lists the highest level of unit tests and saves space. @alalazo Does this seem okay to you?
title: Simplify unit tests listed in Contribution Guide
